stories.text: I'm looking at upgrading my phone and considering declaring app store bankruptcy. Either by switching to Android or creating a new apple id. I swiped though my apps and couldn't find one that I remember paying for in the app store. Some use subscriptions or paid accounts, but those aren't tied to my apple id. How many paid apps do you use / depend on? Anything else I should be concerned with before starting over?
stories.title: Ask HN: How many paid apps do you use?
